Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Owner \Own"er\, n. One who owns; a rightful proprietor; one who has the legal or rightful title, whether he is the possessor or not. --Shak. [1913 Webster]

owner n 1: (law) someone who owns (is legal possessor of) a business; "he is the owner of a chain of restaurants" [syn: {proprietor}] 2: a person who owns something; "they are searching for the owner of the car"; "who is the owner of that friendly smile?" [syn: {possessor}]
